Crime_Type: Human Rights Violations and Serious International Law Offenses
Legal_Provision_Involved: Duty of procedural fairness in immigration or visa applications
Outcome: Decision set aside, application to be redetermined
Grounds_for_Claim: Lack of opportunity to address credibility concerns
Standard_of_Review: Reasonableness or correctness (as applicable in Federal Court)
Evidence_Requirement: Opportunity to respond to credibility doubts
Individual_Status_or_Claim: Applicant seeking immigration or work authorization
Temporal_Context: At the time of application assessment
Legal_Statute: Principles of procedural fairness under Canadian common law
Assessment_Standard: Whether applicant was given chance to respond to credibility issues
State_Protection_Assessment: Insufficient due to lack of fairness
Risk_Factor: Risk of erroneous decision due to lack of response opportunity
Credibility: Employment letter questioned due to similarity with NOC descriptions
Legal_Provision: Common law duty of procedural fairness
Legal_Basis: Judicial review under Federal Court jurisdiction
